# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a set of error options from a raw integer value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The set of flags to use.

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBufferErrorOption] structure’s type properties, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBufferErrorOption/encoderExecutionStatus], instead of this initializer.
